explanation: [0-0] Two men are standing in front of the entrance to a greenhouse. The blond man on the left is wearing a black jacket and work gloves, holding black shovels in both hands and pointing them at the mouth of a white pipe. The man on the right is wearing a blue checkered shirt and a blue baseball cap, with black glasses, carrying a black hose on his shoulder and holding the nozzle to his mouth. In front of the two men is a musical instrument made of white pipes and orange brackets. Next to the instrument is a pot of pink flowers.

[0-3] Then the blond man on the left rhythmically taps the mouth of the pipe with black shovels, a shovel in his right hand. The man in the blue baseball cap blows a beautiful note into the garden hose's nozzle held to his mouth, then walks to the right.
